articles.title: Covid appears to be the 'Achilles' heel' for Southeast Asian economies, says Jefferies - CNBC
articles.description: Many economies in Southeast Asia have struggled to get to grips with Covid in their countries, says Sean Darby from Jefferies.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE The failure to contain Covid infections is impeding the recovery of many Southeast Asian economies, says Sean Darby from Jefferies.
